translations: 印第安人村落；墨西哥牧者的住房；大牧场工人住屋

sentences.sentence: Tolowa, the language of the Tolowa Native American tribe, is spoken by a few members located in the Smith River Rancheria. a sovereign nation, near Crescent City, Calif.
sentences.translation: 托洛瓦语(Tolowa)是美洲土著部落托洛瓦人的语言，住在加州克雷·森特城附近史密斯河定居地的一些原住民说这种语言。
